p: Seasonal fluctuation is found that the Tibetan Plateau and some northern parts of China are drastically fluctuating in terms of precipitation in the spring while the south region with abundant rainfall shows slight fluctuations. In the summer, the slight fluctuation region is focused on the middle-western region of China where there are insufficient water resources. In the autumn, rainfall fluctuation is drastic in Western China and slight in the middle-western region. Winter fluctuation shows drastic fluctuations in Northern China and slight fluctuations in the southern region.
